channel.title: Blogs on Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Portfolio

item.title: Python
item.description: Add at least one actual blog post about the python stuff we have been working on: this can be anything, but must include some python code that executes in a python code chunk (i.e.,{python} #your code) and includes output (can even be examples from hw assignments, etc). You are encouraged to use reticulate to let R and Python talk to each other in chunks! That way you can do it straight from R markdown in python code chunks.
